Uses of Advice in lu.uni.geko.weaver
 

Classes in lu.uni.geko.weaver that implement Advice
 class HashMappedAdvice
          An implementation of the convenience representation (or proxy) of an Advice that uses a HashMap to map advice content elements to their advice instantiation scope.

Attention: The collections returned by this implementation are backed up.

Attention: The extension has to make sure that, as side-effect, the advice elements that have successfully been added are removed from the set of remaining advice elements to be added.
